attributes.action: Ensure that mashed potatoes are 100% mashed potatoes, not like turnip or nowt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having endured many an underwhelming Sunday dinner [thats not lunch, but dinner] I decided that something has to be done to ensure that root vegetables are mashed in their own bowls and with their own integrity. Nobody should have to live with carrots in theit turnip or peas in their potatoes. I've heard about a splinter group that won't allow broccoli and cauliflower to be cooked in the same postcode but I'm not that radical. For God's sake, sign your name before it's too late . . . . .

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
